root.name: Bouncing Babies
root.description: In Bouncing Babies, babies get thrown out of an apartment building. This is a good thing, as the building is on fire. As a fireman's it's your job to catch these babies before they hit the ground. You and your colleague have arrived at the scene with - of all things - a trampoline. Using it, you must bounce the babies into the ambulance which is parked some distance away.The game gives you five lives. Whenever a baby hits the ground, you lose a life. The babies come in waves; the further you get into the game, the more babies are thrown out of the apartment building. How many can you save before you run out of lives?
